choices: You decided to spend time in bed a little longer
You have to go to work
1.content:
You mumble in your sleep.Dreams of people and places drifted in and out of your mind.Suddenly,a thunderous,repeating roar shook you awake,making you jolt up.You looked around,making sense of where you were at."Oh...."You said to yourself,smiling and calming down.The thunderous repeat was simply the alarm clock going off.You squinted your eyes to see the digital numbers off in the distance.It said 7:30.

A collossus reached out to turn off the clock so many miles away.You recognized the collossus in the shape of a hand.Soon,the clock had been shut off."Mmm....morning Honey..."A female voice boomed from the heavens,making you cover your ears unless you wanted them blown off.You cupped your hands around your mouth."Good morning Racheal!!"You shouted as loud as you could for your Giga Giantess of a wife to hear.
1.title: This is a Small Life

12.content:
You began to prepare for work.It was the usual thing.Breakfast was a bacon crumb and a droplet of orange juice....of course the crumb was mountainous,and the droplet an ocean.You just took a few bites and gulps of each.At times you wondered,if everybody in the world was your size,world hunger wouldn't even exist.

You dressed into your uniform specifically made for you by a special tailor who was handsomely paid.You brushed your teeth......once again with a brush a made for you.You had no idea how people crafted things this tiny.Eh,as long as it worked out for you.The rest of the preperation for the day was a daze.The next thing you knew,Racheal was in the car driving,you safely strapped into a compartment made for you...and you were off to work.

Where do you work?
12.title: The Daily Grind

121.content: What kind of lab could it be? Safely in your compartment, you were free to wonder. Was it a research lab? Or a medical lab?
121.title: A Research Lab

choices: She leaves you there to work by the stove
122.content:
As it turned out, you had a job in a restaurant. It wasn't a really high class restaurant, but it wasn't a McDonalds either. It was called "Il Pollo che Arde," and they served Italian food. You were too small to be a waiter or a chef, so you were a chef's assistant. You did several small things around the kitchen, and you do mean small - picking up bits of salt and pepper, chopping garlic into very small cloves, etc. They kept you on a small ledge above one of the stoves. While some people had protested your working in such an environment, you do have to say the owners arranged it well, and you had never ended up in a food dish or gotten accidentally swallowed, not even once. However, that might change soon.

Your wife drove up to the restaurant and carried you to the kitchen. She said goodbye, then left for her own job. As you waited on the ledge, you smelled the fumes of marinara sauce and other stuff.

Soon the chef who watched over you came over to the ledge. Her name was Hannah. She was 30 years old, and African-American. She wore an apron over a t-shirt, jeans, and boots. She regarded you mainly as a coworker but she also helped you a lot of the times. Sometimes you could tell she had a mild lust for you, though.

What are you doing today?
122.title: A Resteraunt?

choices: You want the day for yourself
Racheal wants to spend the day with you
You decide to spend Saturday with one of your daughters
You have to visit a family member
13.content:
You watched as Racheal rose from bed,half clad in a tank top and shorts for her pajamas.You knew she was simply human,but to you...just wow.Her size alone you barely fathom.Each of her footsteps created great earthquakes,and her yawning echoed round the world.She stopped by your side of the bed,which you thought you really didn't need.Being so small,a single thread of fabric could be your entire living space and more.But Racheal insisted on it.She wanted to treat you as if you were normal,one of the many reasons you loved her.

She smiled down at you,squinting her eyes to see the barely visible dust speck that was her husband."Happy Saturday."Each word of hers boomed so loud it was in slo-mo,but her voice retained it's femininity.Your family almost considered Saturday a religious holiday,giving how it gave a break to your entire family from the five days of work,school,and the daily drag.

Racheal reached down,picking you up on the tip of her finger,gently bringing you up to her eye.God...you could get lost in her eyes...both in the metaphorical,and literal sense.
13.title: Weekend

133.content: Which one of your daughters?
133.title: Daughters

choices: Know's you're there....but is in a rather bad mood
1331.content:
If you were still young this would likely be a day of lazily lounging around; avoiding your sisters for fear of being used like a toy. But you were a man; a grown man married with children; like it or not you were going to have to spend the day doing things. Thankfully your size ruled out most physical chores, but that simply meant you had to make up for it twice over in the emotional department. Dealing with any issue anyone in the house had was your job; like it or not. But maybe you could get lucky...

"I think you should spend the day with Ingrid honey."

"Fuck" Then again, maybe not. "She's a big girl; I don't think she needs it."

Rachael looked concerned, "I think she's jealous, since you spent all of last weekend with Morgan."

"She threw me in her shoe!! I was trapped underfoot for three days!" Rachael giggled, "And she's getting punished for yet another of her "Pranks", but I'd think you'd be used to that by now. Remember?"

"Don't remind me." You groaned. Highschool was....interesting. A bunch of confused experimental teens and a near microscopic boy...not the best pairing. And oddly enough over half of the stuff they did involved their feet...weird...maybe some association with bugs and feet or something. You just knew it wasn't natural for some girl to, out of the blue, ask for Foot Worship, but you've seen it happen multiple times. But thankfully; Ingrid was the better of your daughters...granted ever since this whole "Goth" stuff started she's been rougher, she still didn't play with you... too much.

You realized Rachael was awaiting an answer and you looked at her, "Sure, could ya give me a lift?" Rachael did, right to her lips. One intoxicating kiss later you found yourself in Ingrid's room, man your wife could multi-task! With a wink she left; you being in too much of a lovey daze to really notice anything else for a moment.

Right beside the dresser you were on sat a bed, on the bed sat your lovely daughter Ingrid. Ingrid was a beautiful girl, more than any guy deserved in your opinion, but since she entered this phase....it's been looking like she's been dressing the wrong way. Slightly revealing tight black outfits, lots of leather...it was worriesome. But that was why you were there; Dad to the rescue.

"Hey there honey...you okay?" At that moment a paranoia came to mind, Rachael... did tell Ingrid you were there...right? Ingrid wasn't a fan of surprised, and given the increased rough housing, her apparent jealousy, and hatred of surprised. If she found you....things might not look too good. And that didn't even come close to approaching the fact that if she didn't know you were there....even the slightest breath could spell certain doom.

"Please dear god let her know I'm here."

"INGRID!!"

Ingrid....
1331.title: Ingrid

13311.content:
Ingrid turned her head in your direction,smiling slightly."Daddy,calm down.Don't have a seizure."She reached over,her hand going across hundreds of miles in just seconds.She gently picked you up on her forefinger tip,bringing you closer.Her face was a projection that filled your entire view,becoming an entire sky in front of you.You smile,finally calming down.Even though she was going through a goth phase,Ingrid would never hurt you.She was a Daddy's Girl to the bone.

"So Daddy,what's up?"Ingrid asked,whispering to make sure she doesn't burst your ears apart or send you soaring away with her breath."Well,your Mother suggested we hang out today.What's up?"You shouted.

Ingrid let out a little sigh,the noise you could feel reverbrate through the air."Daddy,I'm not jealous about last weekend.In fact,I'm sorry that Morgan treats you like that..."She acted as if it were her fault that Morgan despised you."It's fine.Morgan doesn't really mean all that stuff she does to me."You replied.You half believed what you just said.You just hoped one day Morgan wouldn't reach a point where she doesn't treat you like a human at all.Until then,your fine with her bittersweet love.

"Yeah...whatever...."Ingrid sighed again,half-believing in Morgan like you did."Well,we have the whole day together.What do you wat to do?"You shouted up.

"Well..."Igrid considered this.
13311.title: The Good Daughter

133112.content:
Ingrid looked at her dad with those large hopeful eyes of hers. "Can we go to the mall? I heard that some of the stores just opened and I really wanna check it out." It was rare for Ingrid to want to go to some place as socially alive as a mall. Hell yeah it was okay! But to maintain the "Dad" persona you simply shrugged, "It sounds fine, but why do you need me?" Ingrid averted her gaze in embarrassment, "Well...I try not to ask but...."

It didn't take rocket science to figure it out, "Ahh...money." Ingrid nodded, and you couldn't stop the smile from forming on your lips. "Alright, you know the drill." A sound of agreement came whilst Ingrid was fishing in her purse, eventually pulling out a silver credit card. "I carry the card due to your size and you mutter the number code to me. Right?" Ever like Ingrid, never missed a beat and the heart of an angel. "That's right, good thing you remembered."

Ingrid smiled widely at the praise, "Thank you Daddy! You okay with hitching a ride in the usual place?" The "Usual Place" for Ingrid was her ear, so she could hear you and you weren't particularly suffering. Now if it was Morgan...ho boy...some of the places make you learn for hell in her pocket or something. But thankfully luck handed you the good daughter tonight. "Yeah it works, when do we leave?"

"Right now." Ingrid flatly replied. In a single leap of her bed you heard her barefeet slam on the floor with enough force to make you cringe. Not that Ingrid noticed, with a couple sways of her nice curves she strode her way to a pair of solid black boots. Ugh, simply staring at them brought flashbacks of worse days...goth kids in school... preps with their expensive boots...Rouge....horrible times. Thankfully though Ingrid wasn't like any of them; albeit with the boots, the revealing black tanktop, and thigh level black shorts she could've easily passed for a Mini-Rouge. That was another thing about this goth phase you disliked, simply looking at your daughter reminded you of the Devil...and to make things worse ever since entering this phase Rouge has been like her idol....can you say "Bad Influence?" Thankfully Rouge's moves in that regard didn't seem to fare too well, but a corner of your mind worried about it day in and out. Not even beginning to mention the bad friends Ingrid began to make, kids who would probably grow up to be crooks; and while with them Ingrid seemed to have less morals then usual. As a father it was really worriesome.

Next thing you knew Ingrid's fingernail had you scooped up and heading towards her ear. You were so lost in your nostalgic trauma you nearly left reality for a minute, but you were back; right in time to climb off and in the cave of her ear. You didn't go far, only a few feet before sitting down in a cozy little ridge. All ready and with Daddy on her side Ingrid was off (After explaining to Mom of course.)

She got permission to borrow Rachael's car for the ride so your giant daughter was behind the wheel before the conversations out of boredom began. Just mild small talk, nothing particularly important. You were being Dad, stuck in your out-of-date ways, and Ingrid was putting up with it with a kind hearted smile. Luckily, being in a car made the trip a hundred times shorter. In no time flat you had arrived.

Right away you began to shop with Ingrid, going to a Bookstore, and weapon store (Only browsing), and one or two clothing shops. It was a real blast and every time you said yes to a request you were "Super Dad" , it felt nice, it really did. But the closer the light was, the greater the shadow. Ingrid had walked into Hot Topic when she ran into a group of people you did NOT want either of you to be around...
133112.title: Shopping with Ingrid

choices: "Can we borrow your Dad for a while?"
1331121.content:
Voices, some vaguely familiar and others unknown. The ones you recognized, you dreaded. Ingrid was a good girl, but lately in her gothic phase, she had come across 'friends' that you didn't entirely approve of. A group of girls who shared her darker tastes, but were completely on the other side of the personality spectrum. Ingrid was sweet and considerate, while her friends were on par with the devil herself, Rouge. There were a total of three, Sadie, Mei, and Florence. Sadie was the most tolerable, often neutral in ignoring you unless the others pressured her to mess with you. Mei, a rather cute japanese girl, was the one you found the most annoying. She laughed all the FRIGGIN' time. Florence, the undisputed leader of them, was the most sadistic, but took it easy on you since Ingrid was your daughter.

The first time you had met them, which you dubbed the terrible threesome, Ingrid had invited them over for dinner. Up in your eldest daughter's room, she had introduced you to them. Almost instantly you were subjected to their 'games'. Sadie had you dropped into her boot, and left you to explore it the whole night. Ingrid won in the end though, convincing her to release you back to her. You loved that girl!!

"Hey, Ingrid!!"Sadie's voice broke your train of thought. You felt your giant daughter's body lurch in the direction of the despised voice. They proceeded to chat about school and such, mostly boring topics. Mei's laughter rang in the background the whole time."Aren't goths supposed to be gloomy?!"You mumbled to yourself.

After that, Ingrid had been sucked into their group. They left Hot Topic and proceded to walk over the whole mall. After two hours, Ingrid had decided to head back home."Bye guys! Me and my Dad have to get back soon. I'll see you at school though."Ingrid said to them, about to walk out to the parking lot before Florence grabbed her arm."Wait...your Dad's here?"She took on a amused tone.

"Yeah."Ingrid shrugged."He's right here."

Before you could object, she dug her finger into her ear, obtaining you on her index finger. Bright light and titanic objects greeted you as she held you out to show you to her friends."Say hi, Daddy!!"Ingrid said cheerfully. You cross your arms, giving a half-hearted shout to them.

Florence's maliciously grinning face peered down at you."Hey Ingrid..."She began.
1331121.title: The Wrong Crowd

choices: Stick where you are and wait out.
Go in further and explore a bit.
1331122.content:
"Well, if it isn't dear old Ingrid." The voice coming from the world outside your daughter's ear sends more than a chill down your tiny spine. That's Rogue - the sadistic lady who unfortunately Ingrid has copied in style, if at least thankfully not in personality. Your daughter and her have an odd relationship from what you gather - Ingrid certainly admires her enough to copy part of her dres code but isn't so keen on the woman herself - a thankful triumph of fathering on your part.

The pair attempt some form of half hearted conversation and you realise with more than a smige of thanks what Ingrid is doing - ensuring Rogue is unaware of your close presence. You still recall with some disgust the number of close calls you had with the stupid overgrown goth in the years gone, and why she is still into such things at the age of thirty, not to mention still friends with December (who at least appears to have overcome some of her sterotype) is beyond you. Still she manages to chat well enough to your daughter and opting to trust that as long as you don't speak you shouldn't cause Ingrid undue irritation and thus expose your hiding place you move slowly and deeper into your daughter's ear, slightly smug that at the size of a hundredth of an inch you crawl well enough into the darkened passage and out of sight from any evil villain.

As you reach the turn off you ponder silently how to proceed. Do you trust your current place will keep you safe until Rogue is finished and stay here, or do you take the opportunity to head in further into your daughter's ear and try a bit of careful exploration to pass the time?
1331122.title: Hiding Is An Earful

choices: Put you Dad in your boot while you and I discuss how to handle him.
Hand your Father to me for the day.
13311221.content:
Exploring further into Ingrid scared you, no telling how far was too far in this cavern; and the farther you would've gone, the louder you would've gotten. To the point it might've blown your cover anyway, better to lie and wait. But for reassurance you did secure yourself behind some cartilage. Between these two Goth's you would rather be in Ingrid's boot every day for the rest of your life rather than spend a single day with Rouge; that was how terrible she was. From your hiding spot you could see Rouge's shadow in the distance...man you wished that was all that was there. But of course; the one who owned the shadow stood before your daughter, talking happily.

"So...hows ol tiny doing? My toe's just haven't felt the same since they held him last time." Rouge let out a hearty laugh with her seductively deep voice. God just hearing it seemed arousing...but all Rouge's beauty amounted to absolutely NO soul. The woman was a walking demon.

Ingrid's insides cringed at the way Rouge was talking, she admired Rouge a lot. She could stand up to any man, make them drop with just a look. She could have any man she wants, she was beyond beautiful and brought gothic beauty to untold levels. She was almost a goddess of a role model, and at the same time Ingrid was disgusted by her. Disgusted by her treatment of you; aside from that she seemed like a good person. And yet at the same time someone Ingrid would never want to cross...it was hard to explain.

"Dad? He's been well thank you. He's been busy with me and Morgan a lot though; Mom seems happy regardless."

Rouge's eyes lit up a bit, not that you could tell, call it a disturbance in the Force..."Oh? Busy you say? Do explain."

"Well..." This was not the time for spilling her guts! Not with you in her ear! She knew this and could feel you perking up; this was a Dad's chance here. "Well...I've become Goth recently as you know. And he just worries about me, it's kind of...irritating and bothers me but I'll be fine. And Morgan just does nothing but torture him, not even a week ago she tossed him in her shoe for days!" Ingrid felt relieved; a satisfactory answer without giving her Dad too much either...

Rouge laughed a little bit, "Ah...classic Morgan. But Ingrid..." Her hands grabbed the young girl, "If you're Dad bothers you, just let Auntie Rouge know okay? I have ways of making him see how he was wrong. Or if you want, just toss him in your sock or boot for a while. Feels great, soaks up some sweat, and he learns a lesson. Three birds with one stone."

Ingrid let out a nervous laugh; "Okay, I'll keep that in mind...I'm sorry Rouge but I really have to go. I promised Mom I'd be home in time to help with dinner an-" Ingrid was in the midst of trying to walk away, but Rouge's hand found her shoulder quicker than you can believe. "Nice try dearie, but you need to work on your lying a bit more. Now get Daddy out of your ear so I can see him please."

SHIT Rouge knew you were there! Damn she was smart and observant, why did the evil have to be so talented!? Ingrid was clearly wondering the same thing as a finger came to her ear; reluctantly you hopped down. And found yourself in a never ending plain of Ingrid's hand and it's wrinkles, beyond were the five pillars of her fingers, and even further past that were the two God-like beings of Ingrid and Rouge; each so big that above their chest they seemed fuzzy at the edges. Hell you could hardly SEE Rouge's face past her enormous breasts, but you did see her demented smirk and boy did it scare you.

She knelt over so her face was at Ingrid's palm; normal people would have to squint to see you, but another of Rouge's unreal talents was her eyesight; she seemed to instinctively know where you were at all times (Which may be how she found you actually...) and also possessed the ability to see you clearly without even trying. Of all people it just had to be her...

"Heh, hey there tiny. Remember your Mistress?" Your nervous backing away was all the answer she needed, or wanted for the matter. Rouge's eyes batted to Ingrid who, looked as if she would faint. "Relax dearie; and don't try anything, at his size your Dad might not make it; plus while I may be a bit rough; I won't hurt him. I just want him to understand you a bit better...I mean well, honest."

Ingrid sounded unsure; "I...guess you would know...Aunt December says nothing but good stuff about you."

" BUT DAD SAYS NOTHING BUT BAD!!!!!!" You shouted to the heavens, to no avail.

Somehow you didn't buy it; but it looked like Ingrid just might have. She was definitely hesistant at the least, not good. Rouge seemed to sense she was weak; "Trust me dearie; I know what's best. By the end of this you'll be closer to your Dad than ever; I promise."

Rouge smirked, "Now, I know this will be rough to do but I want you to....
13311221.title: Busted by Rouge!

133112212.content:
"Now, Ingrid, would you be so kind as to put your little father into my hand?"

Under normal circumstances Ingrid would've said no, but Rouge had been incredibly manipulative, and couldn't back out now. So Ingrid responded, "...All right. But give him back by tomorrow morning, okay?"
"Sure thing. Now hand him over."
"Promise?"
"Yes, yes, I'll use him for just one night."
"Okay then. Here he comes." With that Ingrid tilted her hand ever so slightly. For you, this meant having your whole world turned to the side. As the walls of Ingrid's hand went sideways, you fell down and down, and you didn't think it would end...until you landed on a patch of paler skin. This was Rouge's hand. Now there was no escape.
"Bye now," Rouge said as Ingrid walked away. Then she turned her attention back to you.

"Well, my tiny slave, it's too bad I couldn't get you for longer. But one night is good enough i suppose." Then she giggled.
"I can't hold you there while I go back to my house. How about I put you in my ____?"
133112212.title: Hand your Father to me for the day.

choices: Dropped you into her back pocket
placed you on a pair of her flip-flops,and she wears them
1332.content:
10:30am

Racheal entered Morgan's room and settled you down on her bedside table,smiling at you as she left.Your daughter was laying on her bed,cellphone in hand,chatting it up with one of her friends.You looked around at her room,the wall covered in posters of current popstars and various other topics of media teenage girls are interested in.You waited patiently for Morgan to finish her call.

1:45pm

"END IT ALREADY!!!"You shouted with aggressive impatience,jumping to your feet.Apparantly,Morgan had heard you.She got off her bed and stood in front of her bedside table which you were on.You actually gulped,staring up at her.You could barely see her face,it was so way up there.But you could tell she was annoyed.She picked you up not so gently,bringing you to her ear for a better hear."What was that,Dad?"He tone was on the border from annoyance to anger.

"I said end the call already!God,Morgan,you've bee on the damn cell for three hours!!"You shouted,trying to sound like the adult you didn't feel like.There was a pause."Stacy,I'll call you back."Morgan said to her friend,closing the cellphone and dropping it into her back jeans pocket."What was that again Dad?I didn't hear you that time too."

"Morgan,do you know how much that three hour call probably costed us?"You tried to sound tough and mean,but the adult in you was withering fast to a being a million times your size.

"I have the right to call whoever I want to,as long as I want.You and Mom payed for it,so I'm going to use it."Morgan simply replied,and in her tone you noticed hints of anger.

"I think its time to prank you again Dad!That'd be funny!"

"Morgan wait!You are so grounded!Wait until your mother hears about-"You were cut off as Morgan....
1332.title: A Prank?

choices: And Ingrid appears from behind. "Where do you think you're going?"
Success! She's home free, time for some fun at the beach!
13322.content:
In the midst of your angry (And slightly scared) parenting Morgan simply let go of you. You were so used to your size at this age that you had forgotten that falling at about any place would result in your death, but now you remembered; just in time for gravity to run its course. You looked into the mischievous gaze of your daughter as her already ungodly large face grew farther and farther away, only increasing the sheer audacity of her presence. You fell twenty-thirty feet before you landed, much much sooner than you expected but who gave a damn? The soft surface you landed on saved your life. All around you saw light faded blue for miles, and above a giant arch seemed to cross the heavens. Reminded you a bit of Halo actually...and then you started piecing it together. Blue, arch, soft cushiony ground.....you were on Morgan's sandal!

You follow the hand that held the footwear nearly neck level back up to Morgan's brimming smile. You started yet another angry parent rant but Morgan quickly shut it down with her much louder, more intimidating voice. She made no attempts to lower her voice, nearly bursting your eardrums. "Teehee, looks like my flip-flop saved your life daddy. Sounds to me like you owe it, and its owner some gratitude. Don't worry I know just how you can make it up." You felt chills up your spine as Morgan's face grew farther and farther away, soon her face was partially clouded by her breasts, which even though they only started already seemed too big to you. Then her waist rose above you, until finally you and the sandal were on the wooden floor, Morgan's face almost a blurr from the sheer distance between you two.

Of course that had nothing on what was to come, fearfully you looked at the bare toes Morgan was flexing, painted Azure to match her favorite flip-flops, and tapping along the floor to create light booms for your ears. To your miniature eyes you easily made out the little things like small beads of foot sweat (She had a slight problem with that) and little beads of old dirt and sock lint. Experience told you what was about to come, and boy you called it. The monolithic toes that you would barely be able to climb in a week was coming your way, along with a playful chuckle from Morgan above.

Perfectly theatrical Morgan drew out her foot's entrance, slowly sliding it over her flip-flop, but not allowing her sole to touch the sweat absorbent leather just yet. Her toes had just passed the "Arch" and fully entered the sandal before she addressed you again. "Now Daddy, I don't want you to still feel indebted to my feet after this so would you please kiss my foot while your with it? It did save your life after all so I don't think it'll be a problem." If Morgan wasn't your daughter you probably would've shouted some curses, maybe even make a break for it. But past experiences always showed the latter didn't work. Still, your daughter's "Pranks" did get tiresome, always some kind of angle to it. Like a chair would save your life from a fall (which she caused), she would claim you owed her butt and would sit on you. Occasionally she even just went with the much easier "I'm a goddess and you're a bug act." and sometimes she even just went and did something wordlessly. It was almost like she was roleplaying with it; sad to say you were the victim in these roleplays...

"Ready or not here come's the hero of the hour!" About thirty yards above Morgan's foot began it's descent towards her sandal. Almost heroically you stood your ground and looked at the incoming mass. This wouldn't be the first time you were underfoot, Rouge, December, Morgan, Melly and even your own mother had each done it at one point or another. You would live, you'd be under a 100 tons of pressure, soaked it foot sweat and probably smell, but you'd live. Mere moments later Morgan's foot overcame you, capturing you right beneath the ball of her foot. Nearly instantaneously you caught the odor of feet in your nostrils as sweat already seemed into your clothing. It was a familiar sensation but that didn't mean you had to like it any.

As if having you suffer at her feet wasn't enough Morgan poured some salt into the wounds, "Why I don't feel any kissing! It's okay Daddy, don't be shy. Your savior deserves a reward doesn't she?" Grumbling you did as you were expected, as humiliating as it may have been you began to kiss your daughter's sole. If being an adult taught you anything it was humility, that didn't make it any easier though. Of course Morgan laughing it up miles above didn't exactly help neither.

The weightless sensation of floating told you she had begun walking, succeeding in sliding you further into the wrinkles of her sole whilst she did the natural walking motions. It hurt like the sun itself had fallen on you, but you knew Morgan was taking it easy, why? Mom. Rachael would easily piece it together if she had just left her husband with Morgan and Morgan was leaving, so she had to be stealthy about it. Cautiously Morgan sidled her way to the front door, so far no one was around (To your dismay and her joy), All she had to do was open the door and she was home free!

Nervously Morgan bit her lip and grabbed the door handle, turning it ever so slowly...
13322.title: Time for another Prank

choices: "I guess Dad wouldn't mind TOO much..."
"No way!! Nice try Morgan! Now give him up this instant!"
133221.content:
"Where do you think you're going?"

The voice came from behind Morgan, and you accurately imagined the goosebumps forming all over as she slowly turned around. Facing her big sister, Ingrid. "Well; just decided to go out for a walk. Maybe visit a friend." Nervous sweat started forming at Morgan's various body parts, sad to say her feet were included. Nothing you weren't accostomed to though, and it made a great lubricant. Beneath Morgan's massive foot you used your sweat covered body to slide from beneath it. Soon you were right between her big and second toes; looking up at your daughters in the stand off of the week.

Ingrid smirked at Morgan, "Oh? Well why don't I come along then? Gotta look out for family you know."

A nervous backaway step by Morgan, fatal mistake. "Nah it's okay, I really don't want to burden you like that."

"Why's that?" Ingrid stepped forward, "Because you're embarrassed to be around your pretty goth sister?"

It was the window Morgan wanted, "...Yeah! Sor-"

"Or because you have Dad with you and don't want me to catch you?" The air froze up, Morgan petrified and Ingrid smiling victoriously. "You really have to work on your poker face, even if Mom didn't tell me ahead of time. You have to be one of the worst liars I've met."

Busted, you knew it, Ingrid knew it, and Morgan knew it; no use holding up the facade anymore. "So what if I did? At his size being a good toy is about all he's good for. Beside's I saved his life; he owes me." The sudden dark tone Morgan was speaking with shocked Ingrid and you beyond belief. Especially you, it was like your daughter held no love for you...or maybe she was a much better liar than granted.
